# Anatomy
###### Trails Anatomy

## Tags
``root directory```

## Where am I ?

In the root project directory.

This is the place where you have launch the ```yo trails``` command

### Path:

>  [api/](api/README.md)

> config/

> node_modules/

> .editorconfig

> .gitignore

> .trailsrc

> index.js

> LICENCE

> package.json

> README.md

> server.js
